oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Raymond B. Witt correspondence with Thomas F. Pettigrew, 1960 December 20
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Witt, Raymond B., 1915-2000
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Raymond B. Witt, attorney for the defendants in Mapp v. Board of Education about using Thomas Pettigrew, professor of social psychology, as an expert witness in an appellate trial.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mapp v. Board of Education of Chattanooga; Segregation in education -- Law and legislation; Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
